GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a requested article by the provided article_id

article.title: Sony Vaio; or, The Laptop

article.body: Call me Mitchell. Some years ago..

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Add a comment to a specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Add a specified number of votes to a specified article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments under the requested article

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
